author: rich
msg: There is a new element for configuring multipart request handling in netui-config.xml:
If this element is not present, the default is 'disabled'.  This provides better behavior (and more flexible options) for file uploads, which present a security risk.
There is also a per-pageflow setting, which is configured in the page flow source file like this:
This setting overrides the value in netui-config.xml.
Note that the <controller> element in a page flow's generated Struts config file can still be overridden/tailored using the Struts merge feature.
